Or is that back-handed. By the way guys, only four more shopping days until
Christmas (three here), so its probably time to think about going out and
buying that auto emergency repair kit for the woman (women) in your life.
I'm planning on picking mine up any day now. So, Merry Christmas, dudes!!

 

Gordon
